title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

altTitles.ja: 妄想先生

altTitles.en: Delusional Teacher

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!

description.en: Horror Mangaka Hino Hideshi puts Nobita and Doraemon thru hell.

altTitles.ja: ちょろくてかわいい君が好き

altTitles.en: You Are Too Naive, My Sweetheart!
I Love You My Naive Sweetheart!

description.en: Oono Nana is a high school girl whose heart easily flutters at the nonchalant words of the opposite sex and she is very much aware of her "easy" disposition. One day, in the spark of the moment, she unexpectedly voiced her opinion out loud to Sudaka, the solitary yankee from her class. She was expecting to be attacked for it but she received a confession from him instead! And now she keeps getting easily swayed by Sudaka's straightforwardness!

altTitles.ja: 押しかけギャルの中村さん

altTitles.en: Nakamura-san, the Uninvited Gyaru

description.en: She tries to show off that she is a bold modern gyaru..... but in reality she's actually a naive and shy girl! Akiyama, your typical glasses wearing otaku, works part-time with Nakamura, a gyaru from the same university. However, he has never tried talking to her before because he thinks "otakus and gyarus live in different universe". But then one day, all of a sudden Nakamura-san rolls into Akiyama's house, where he lives alone...? And now get this, Nakamura-san, who is usually not afraid to show her sexy side and puts up a strong, confident blushes right away! A romantic comedy about a gyaru and an otaku living together!

altTitles.ja: 異世界美少女受肉おじさんと
ファ美肉

altTitles.ru: Фантастический мир с обращённым в красавицу мужчиной и…

altTitles.en: With a Fogie Reincarnated as a Pretty Fantasy Girl
Life with an Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated into a Total Fantasy Knockout

description.en:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However… will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
description.ru: Скучный мужчина вместе с его красивым лучшим другом были призваны в другой мир обнаженной богиней! Однако из-за озорства богини одного превратили в... невероятно красивую девушку?! Чтобы обратно вернуть своё тело, они должны отправиться в путешествие, чтобы победить Короля Демонов!! Да пускай начнётся романтическая комедия, наполненная полным безумием иного мира!
description.pt-br:
Hinata Tachibana, um trabalhador de escritório sitiado de 32 anos, e seu belo melhor amigo Tsukasa Jinguuji foram convocados para outro mundo por uma deusa nua. No entanto, por causa das travessuras da deusa, Tachibana foi transformada em uma garota bonita inigualável ?! Para recuperar seu corpo, ele tem que viajar com seu melhor amigo para derrotar o rei demônio !! 

No entanto... eles serão capazes de manter as mãos longe um do outro !? 

"Um homem mais velho que se tornou uma garota bonita" e "Um homem mais velho e bonito"! Deixe a loucura outra jornada mundial rom-com começar!!

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.pt-br: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Transmigrated Somewhere
It Seems I've Transmigrated Somewhere
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

title.en: Seijo ni naru no de Nidoume no Jinsei wa Katte ni sasete moraimasu ~Outaishi wa, Zensei de Watashi wo Futta Koibito deshita~

altTitles.ja: 聖女になるので二度目の人生は勝手にさせてもらいます ～王太子は、前世で私を振った恋人でした～

altTitles.en: Since I Became a Saint, I'll Do Whatever I Want with My Second Life ~The Prince Was My Lover Who Threw Me Away in My Previous Life~

altTitles.zh: 二周目人生成为圣女要过随心所欲的人生~王太子是前世甩掉我的恋人~

description.en:
My fiancé betrayed me and married a nobleman’s daughter. Furthermore, I, Cecil died at the age of 18 after suffering from a cold.   
  
“I will absolutely live my life as freely as I want!”  
  
From then on, 500 years has passed. Cecil, who was reborn as Liz, lived with her memories of her previous life and with the help of her mysterious powers. One day, Liz, who was commoner, was discovered and became a saint candidate. But, "her lover who betrayed her" appeared in front of her!  
  
Magic? I don’t have that. Social status? Commoner. But I’ll do whatever I want with my second life!  


---

Alternative Raw:  
<https://comic.pixiv.net/works/5351>  
<http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/38096>

“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

altTitles.ja: 写真写りの悪い友人
このたびは

altTitles.en: My Condolences

description.en: Arranged marriage of a mangy woman. Is it bad to be so mean? A beautiful woman (32) finally meets a handsome man (34, Okute). Since we met, I've been in charge of the proposal and preparations for the ceremony...!? "Is it okay for me to do it?" "It's my face." My face doesn't change even a little bit! The part-timer's son-in-law's narrow-shouldered funeral, the hostess' daughter's homecoming and pregnancy, and the sequel, "My Little Sister," are newly included in the new edition. In addition, 7 stories of life theater with great taste are included.

title.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keep Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keep Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en:
I’m Yukito Kokonoe, and I’m the one who had the worst luck with women. My mother abandoned me, my sister hated me, and my childhood friend, who I thought she had feelings for me, rejected me before I could tell her, and then lied to me when I was heartbroken. As a result, I found myself completely emotionally broken, and it was too late to do anything about it. But that was strange. For some reason, I feel like the women who traumatized me are glancing at me. Yeah, I must be imagining it!

This is a love comedy about a boy who has been hurt too much and too late, and the women who have hurt him, in a misunderstanding that starts too late and never starts at all. “Love?　What’s that, can I eat it?”
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre
I Will Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: The Villainess Flips the Script!

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)

description.id: Kumpulan cerita horror oneshot yang dipublish @kuro_otome di twitter

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

altTitles.ja: キリングバイツ

description.en:
People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection!
Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity. This ultimate battle of the beasts will shock you to your core!

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%AD%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E3%83%90%E3%82%A4%E3%83%84)
description.ru:
Один учёный создал существ которые являются гибридом человека и животного, и богачи ставят ставки на исход их поединков. Случайные знакомые просят студента колледжа Номота Юя покатать их по городу, и ближе к вечеру он узнает, что они просто хотели подобрать и изнасиловать девушку. Девушка, которую они похищают оказывается “гибридом” которую зовут Хитоми, которая убивает всех кроме Юи. Хитоми является гибридом барсука, который был назван самым бесстрашным из всех животных. Теперь Хитоми остаётся с Юи, для его защиты!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Shinya Murata's Twitter](https://twitter.com/jojojon)  
- [Sumita's Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_kazasa)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20213)
description.pt-br: Pessoas estão sendo criadas como híbridos animal-humano e batalham entre si, empresas poderosas apostam no resultado de seus duelos. A história inicia com um cara que se meteu no rapto de uma garota contra a sua vontade, todos menos ele acabam mortos pela garota, que ele descobre ser um dos híbridos, competindo com outros de sua raça em duelos mortais envolvendo complexas apostas. Sem aviso prévio, ele acaba obrigado a se tornar o parceiro da garota.

description.en: The hilarious story of reaction between anthropomorphic mentos and cola.

altTitles.en: Wondercat Kyuu-chan

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: The Kouhai who Went from Introvert to Influencer

altTitles.ja: 後輩は陰キャ上がりのインフルエンサー

altTitles.pt-br: A Caloura Anti-social é uma Influencer em Ascenção

altTitles.ja-ro: Kouhai wa Inkya Agari no Infuruensaa

altTitles.es-la: Una kohai que fue introvertida ahora es streamer

description.en:
After years of missed connections, our protagonist reunites with the junior he got along well with in high school. However, apparently, she has become a famous influencer.

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/1722837/series/225813)
description.tr: Yıllarca süren ayrılıktan sonra kahramanımız, lise yıllarında iyi anlaştığı alt sınıfıyla yeniden bir araya gelir. Ancak görünüşe göre o artık bir internet ünlüsüdür.
description.pt-br: Após anos de desencontros, nosso protagonista reencontra a caloura com quem se dava bem no ensino médio. Porém, aparentemente, ela se tornou uma famosa influenciadora.

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan

altTitles.ja: 最凶の支援職【話術士】である俺は世界最強クランを従える

altTitles.en: I'm the Most Evil Support Class【Talker】and I'll Subdue the Strongest Clan in the World

altTitles.vi: "Thánh Ngôn" khét tiếng nhất là người điều hành Clan vĩ đại nhất thế giới

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou no Shien-shoku "Wajutsushi" Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Kuran wo Shitagaeru

altTitles.es-la: Soy el Talker más Despiadado y Dominaré al Clan más Fuerte del Mundo

description.en:
Noel, a youth who admires his grandfather, who was hailed as a hero, and aspires to be the strongest Seeker. But his Job that appeared in the appraisal, was the support class Talker.

Talker is a peaky job with the weakest individual abilities. A job that could never become the strongest.

"If I create the strongest clan and become the clan master, then I’ll essentially be the strongest."

Thinking that, Noel worked hard persistently to fulfil his ambition. On the other hand, the merciless methods he employed for the sake of his ambition were acknowledged by everyone as the path of "evil." However, Noel’s distinct talent attracted many powerful people and they began to gather under him…

This is the story of how the most evil Talker, who seeks to be the strongest, subdues his allies and creates the strongest clan in the world.
description.vi: Đây là hành trình vươn tới đỉnh cao giới truy thủ của kẻ sinh ra mang trong mình một trong những chức nghiệp được đánh giá là yếu nhất - Noel Stollen.
description.es-la:
Noel, un joven que admira a su abuelo, que fue aclamado como un gran héroe, aspira a ser un buscador fuerte como él. Pero el trabajo que apareció en su evaluación, fue la clase de soporte “Talker” (Orador).

Talker es un trabajo con las habilidades individuales más débiles. Un trabajo que nunca podría convertirse en el más fuerte.

「Si creo el clan más fuerte y me convierto en el líder del clan, entonces esencialmente seré el más fuerte」

Pensando eso, y gracias al apoyo de su abuelo, Noel trabajó y entrenó arduamente por años con el objetivo de cumplir su ambición. Por otro lado, los métodos crueles que empleó por el bien de su ambición fueron reconocidos como inhumanos. Sin embargo, el talento distintivo de Noel atrajo a muchas personas poderosas y comenzaron a reunirse debajo de él...

Esta es la historia del Talker más despiadado que busca ser el más fuerte, forjando aliados para crear el clan más fuerte del mundo.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅰ 悪性隔絶魔境 新宿 新宿幻霊事件

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten I: Akushou Kakuzetsu Makyou, Shinjuku - Maboroshi Tamashi Jiken

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность I: Карантинная территория злого умысла, Синдзюку- Инцидент Фантома Синдзюку

description.en:
The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.
description.ru: Новая сингулярность, которая появилась перед Рицуко Фуджимару, который спас мир. Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

title.en: Tensei Oujo wa Ai yori Ryouchi ga Hoshii no de Seiryaku Kekkon wo Kibou shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 転生王女は愛より領地が欲しいので政略結婚を希望します！

altTitles.zh: 转生公主比起爱更想要领地所以期望政治联姻！

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生公主比起愛更想要領地所以期望政治聯姻！

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Princess Wants Territories Over Love so She Wants a Political Marriage

description.en:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

a love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

title.en: The Ice Guy and His Cool Female Colleague

altTitles.ja: 氷属性男子とクールな同僚女子

altTitles.ja-ro: Koori Zokusei Danshi to Cool na Douryo Joshi

altTitles.en: Ice Guy and the Cool Female Colleague

altTitles.fr: The Ice Guy & the Cool Girl
L'homme glacé et la consœur cool
L'homme froid et la collègue cool

altTitles.es: El chico de hielo y su genial colega femenina

altTitles.th: บริษัทลุ้นรัก หนุ่มหิมะกับสาวสุดคูล

altTitles.tr: Buz çocuk ve havalı i̇ş arkadaşı

altTitles.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事

altTitles.zh-hk: 冰屬性男子與無表情女子

altTitles.vi: Anh chàng băng giá và cô nàng đồng nghiệp lạnh lùng

description.de: Himuro ist Büroangestellter und der Nachfahre einer Schneefrau. Wann immer seine Gefühle außer Kontrolle geraten, werden seine Kollegen seinen eisigen Kräften ausgesetzt. Jedoch besitzt er entgegen seiner frostigen Fähigkeiten eine sehr warmherzige und freundliche Persönlichkeit. Er liebt Katzen und Blumen, auch wenn er ihnen nicht zu nahe kommen kann. Diejenige, die seine Gefühle immer wieder aus der Bahn wirft und sein Herz zum Schmelzen bringt, ist seine stets gefasst wirkende und ein wenig exzentrische Kollegin Fuyutsuki. Obwohl alle Kollegen durch den stetigen Ausbruch seiner Kräfte von seinen Gefühlen für Fuyutsuki wissen, ist diese vollkommen ahnungslos. Dies hält Himuro jedoch nicht davon ab, zu versuchen, ihr Herz für sich zu gewinnen.
description.en:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?
description.fr:
Himuro est le descendant d'une yuki-onna, une femme des neiges. Par cette filiation, il plonge inconsciemment son entourage dans un environnement proche de l'Arctique lorsqu'il se concentre.

Pire encore, il passe pour un homme qu'il n'est pas : perçu comme insensible et au tempérament glacial, il est en réalité chaleureux, aime les chats et les fleurs.

Son état finit par attirer l'attention de sa collégue Fuyutsuki, dont il est secrètement amoureux. Himuro se montre alors déterminé à capturer le coeur de la jeune femme.
description.id: Romansa lembut yang lucu tentang dekendensi yuki-onna yang membekukan area sekitarnya setiap kali dia berbicara dengan rekan kerjanya yang imut.
description.it:
Il manga racconta la dolce storia d'amore tra due colleghi, la tranquilla e dolce Fuyutsuki-san e Himuro-kun, discendente di una donna delle nevi, che letteralmente ghiaccia ogni cosa attorno a lui.

---
Questa è la storia di Himuro, il discendente di una donna delle nevi, e della sua gentile seppur particolare collega Fuyutsuki... Anche se a prima vista possono sembrare due persone imperturbabili, entrambi sono in realtà molto impacciati quando si tratta di questioni di cuore; infatti l’amore che Himuro nutre nei confronti di Fuyutsuki imperversa nel suo animo come una bufera di neve, impedendogli di compiere il fatidico primo passo. Lei, d’altro canto, pare del tutto inconsapevole dei suoi stessi sentimenti...
description.ja: 現代を生きる雪女の末裔な氷室くんと、同僚のちょっとユニークで優しい冬月さん。一見、クールに見えつつも、二人は恋愛にすっごく不器用。冬月さんへの「好き」が心の内で吹雪のように吹き荒れる氷室くんはもう一歩を踏み出せず、一方の冬月さんは自分の感情に超が付くほど鈍感で!?　Twitter＆pixivで大人気!!　クールな二人のピュア過ぎラブコメディー♪　単行本だけの描き下ろしマンガ３編を収録☆
description.ko:
현대를 살아가는 설녀의 후예 히무로와 
약간 독특하면서도 상냥한 동료 후유츠키. 

언뜻 보면 쿨해보이는 두 사람이지만, 연애에 관해서는 놀랄 만큼 서투르다. 
후유츠키를 향한 ‘호감’이 마음속에서 눈보라처럼 몰아치자, 
히무로는 더 이상 한 걸음도 나아가지 못하고. 
후유츠키 역시도 자신의 감정에 둔감하기는 마찬가지였는데!? 

Twitter&pixiv에서 대인기!! 
쿨한 두 사람의 맑다 못해 투명한 러브 코미디♪ 

단행본만의 오리지널 에피소드 3편도 수록☆
description.pl: Poznajcie Himuro, żyjącego we współczesnej Japonii potomka yuki-onny, oraz jego nieco nietypową koleżankę z biurka obok, Fuyutsuki. Choć na pierwszy rzut oka oboje wydają się spokojni i opanowani, tak naprawdę w miłości nie do końca dobrze sobie radzą. Himuro, w którego sercu panuje miłosna zamieć, nie jest w stanie wykonać kolejnego kroku naprzód, zaś Fuyutsuki zdaje się nie zauważać jego starań…
description.ru: Милый пушистый роман о классной работнице и её, холодном как лёд, коллеге.
description.th:
ฮิมุโระคุง ชายหนุ่มผู้สืบเชื้อสายของสาวหิมะซึ่งใช้ชีวิตอยู่ในยุคปัจจุบัน 
และคุณฟุยุสึกิ เพื่อนร่วมงานสาวผู้อ่อนโยนและค่อนข้างไม่เหมือนใคร 
หากมองแค่ผิวเผิน หนุ่มสาวคู่นี้ก็ดูเป็นคนคูลๆ อยู่หรอก 
แต่พอเป็นเรื่องราวความรักแล้ว ทั้งสองกลับไม่เอาไหนซะเลย
ฮิมุโระคุงผู้ได้แต่เก็บความ "ชอบ" 
ที่มีต่อฟุยุสึกิไว้ในใจประหนึ่งพายุหิมะที่โหมกระหน่ำ 
โดยไม่กล้าก้าวออกไปเริ่มต้นสักที 
ส่วนฝ่ายคุณฟุยุสึกิเองก็ช่างความรู้สึกช้าไม่รู้ใจตัวเองเลย!?
description.tr: Sevimli iş arkadaşıyla her konuştuğunda çevreyi donduran ve Yuki-Onna'nın soyundan gelen adam hakkında sevimli, kabarık bir romantizm.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy. Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy.
description.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事漫画 ，当雪男遇上酷酷女同事，办公室将掀起一场恋爱暴风雪！
description.pt-br: Himuro-kun, descendente de uma Yuki-onna moderna, acabou de chegar em seu novo trabalho, e acaba criando tempestades de neve e bonecos de neve quando é tomado por suas emoções e perde o controle. Sua paixão secreta por Fuyutsuki-san, uma colega de trabalho única, mas gentil, cresce tão forte que congela às vezes aqueles ao seu redor. Por outro lado, Fuyutsuki-san, que muitas vezes é visto como legal pelos outros, também está muito interessada no misterioso Himuro-kun. O relacionamento deles muda gradualmente através do trabalho diário e dos eventos da empresa, e eles também começam a passar tempo juntos, mas ambos são desajeitados no amor e não conseguem se aproximar…

title.en: Batsu Ichi Arasaa Joshi to Danshi Kokosei

altTitles.ja-ro: Batsu Ichi Arasaa Joshi to Danshi Kokosei

altTitles.en: Divorced Girl and High School Boy

altTitles.ja: バツイチアラサー女子と男子高校生

altTitles.en: Promise Cinderella Strike One

description.en: Promise Cinderella's official spin-off depicting the daily life of the high school boy and the divorced young woman, half a year after the first chapter of the main series.

altTitles.ja: 地獄の軍団

description.en:
A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing 
the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

altTitles.ja: 一ノ瀬家の大罪

altTitles.en: The Ichinose Family's Deadly Sins

altTitles.pt-br: Os Pecados Capitais da Família Ichinose

description.en: Tsubasa Ichinose is a middle schooler who loses his memory in an accident. He is able to safely reunite with his family, but is soon faced with a new shocking reality... What is going on with this family?! From the creator of Takopi's Original Sin comes a new kind of dramatic story!
description.pt-br: Ichinose Tsubasa é um estudante do ensino médio que perdeu a memória em um acidente. Ele é capaz de se reunir com segurança com sua família, mas logo se depara com uma nova realidade chocante... O que está acontecendo com essa família?!

title.en: Akuyuu no Ore ga Ponkotsu Kishi wo Miterarenai n da ga, Dou Sewa wo Yakya Ii?～ Madome Gaiden～

altTitles.ja: 悪友の俺がポンコツ騎士を見てられないんだが、どう世話を焼きゃいい? ～まどめ外伝～

altTitles.en: A Villain's Dilemma: How to Not Meddle too Much with a Clumsy Holy Knight's Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyuu no Ore ga Ponkotsu Kishi wo Mite Rare Naindaga, Dou Sewa wo Yakya Ii?～ Madome Gaiden～

altTitles.ru: Я, заклятый друг, не могу смотреть на эту глупую девушку-рыцаря. Как же мне о ней заботиться?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's (Friend's) Dilemma: How to Babysit a Crybaby Knight

description.en: A clumsy knight and a magician who struggles to understand his own feelings. The story of how two arch-enemies end up closer than they ever thought they would be. Spin-off of「Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?」, which follows the daily life of Barbaros on his job of protecting the Captain of the Holy Knights, Chastel Lillqvist.
description.id: Spin-off dari Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga Dou Medereba Ii?
description.pt-br: Um cavaleiro desajeitado e um mágico que luta para entender seus próprios sentimentos. A história de como dois arqui-inimigos acabam mais próximos do que jamais pensaram que estariam. Spin-off de 「Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?」, que segue a vida diária de Bárbaros em seu trabalho de proteger o Capitão dos Cavaleiros Sagrados, Chastel Lillqvist.

altTitles.ja: 姉の友人 (one-shot)

altTitles.en: My Older Sister's Friend
The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち ( Serialization)
Ane no Yuujin (One-shot)

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent!

Chapters 3 and onwards can be found in the [serialised version](https://mangadex.org/title/1d330951-583e-423e-9cd7-abcd6f761f53/ane-no-tomodachi)
description.ja: 男子高校生・旭の家に入り浸る、姉の友人・ひなこ。いつも思わせぶりな態度で心を惑わせるのは、弟…というかペット？扱いだからと思っていたけれど…？距離感バグりぎみギャル×おかん系オタク男子、ジレきゅんラブ！

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

altTitles.en: Dogs Red

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: My Older Sister's Friend

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

altTitles.en: Himari's Surroundings

altTitles.ja: ひまりのまわり

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

altTitles.ja: ヨメガキッす

description.en:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

altTitles.en: A Certain Scientific Railgun

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

title.en: Ore no Ie no Koakuma Imouto

altTitles.ja: 俺の家の小悪魔妹

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie no Koakuma Imouto

altTitles.en: Little Devil Sister In My House
The Little Devil Younger Sister in My House

description.en:
Mao-chan is a cheeky high school girl who loves to tease her virgin big (step)brother in naughty ways. 

However, her true intention is actually...?

(Source: BookLive)

---

Note: the original Pixiv series has been collected and published into 2 volumes.
Volume 1 contains chapters 1-20. Volume 2 contains chapters 21-42.

Links:
* Alternative Official Raw - [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20063387/vol_no/001)
description.ja: 真桜(まお)ちゃんは童貞のお兄ちゃんをえっちにからかうのが大好きな生意気JK。だけどその本意は実は…?

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

altTitles.en: Tokimori-san Is Completely Defenseless!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki No Kanojo Ni Naru, Onnanoko Ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi Ni Jikka Ni Kaettara Otouto Ga TS Shiteta

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Tokyo Cannabis Special Ward - The Guy Called Cannabis King

altTitles.ja: 東京カンナビス特区 大麻王と呼ばれた男

altTitles.ja-ro: Toukyou Cannabis Tokku - Taimaou to Yobareta Otoko
Tokyo Cannabis Tokku - Taimaou to Yobareta Otoko

altTitles.en: Tokyo Cannabis Special Zone - A Man Called the Cannabis King
Toukyou Cannabis Special Ward - The Guy Called Cannabis King
A Man Called the Cannabis King in the Tokyo Cannabis Special Zone

altTitles.vi: Đặc khu Cần Sa Tokyo - Người đàn ông được mệnh danh là Vua Cần Sa

description.en: An owner of a flower shop has a deficit management, then he encounter the forbidden plant cannabis.
description.ja: 花屋を営む千東森生(41)は、妻と高校生の娘との 3 人暮らし。花屋の経営は芳しくなく、妻はパートに出て、なんとか生計を立てていた。そんな折に届いた大学の同窓会の報せ。妻に後押しされ、同窓会へ参加した森生は、かつての親友・加賀山に声をかけられる。久々の再会に、昔を懐かしむ森生だったが、加賀山からとある仕事を提案され…。

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES
Maeda Taison Blues

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: ELDEN RING Become Load

description.en:
Guided by a blessing, the fading adventurer who has reached the land between the two lands sets out on a journey to become the king of Elde - and he is not alone.

This comic book depicts Elden Ring's epic adventures, including fascinating characters encountered along the way, various dungeon explorations, and battles with powerful bosses.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

altTitles.en: Bocchi Hitori's ____ Life
The ____ Life of Being Alone

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの○○生活

description.en:
Hitori Bocchi suffers from extreme social anxiety, she’s not good at talking to people, takes pretty extreme actions, is surprisingly adept at avoiding people, her legs cramp when she overexerts herself, gets full of herself when alone, will vomit when exposed to extreme tension and often comes up with plans. Now she is entering middle school and her only friend, Yawara Kai, is attending a different school. Kai gives her an ultimatum: she'll stop being Bocchi's friend until Bocchi befriends all of her classmates. Will Bocchi make it!?  

---
  
**Links:**  
- [Alternative Raw](http://daiohg.dengeki.com/lineup/516/)  
- [Alternative Raw 2](http://daiohg.dengeki.com/sp/bocchi/)
- [Alternative Raw 3 - Pixiv Comics](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/2176)
description.it: Hitori Bocchi è molto ansiosa, non è brava a parlare con gli altri ed evita il più possibile i contatti con le persone. Ora sta per iniziare le medie e la sua unica amica, Yawara Kai, andrà in un'altra scuola. Questo vuol dire che Bocchi rimarrà da sola, circondata da nuovi compagni con i quali dovrà fare amicizia, prima di poter parlare di nuovo con Kai. Difatti le due si sono fatte una promessa: non saranno più amiche se entro il diploma Hitori non sarà amica con tutti i suoi compagni di classe.
description.pt-br:
Hitori Bocchi sofre de extrema ansiedade social, ela não é boa em falar com as pessoas, toma ações bastante extremas, é surpreendentemente hábil em evitar as pessoas, suas pernas ficam com cãibras quando ela se esforça demais, fica cheia de si quando está sozinha, vomita quando exposta a tensão extrema  e muitas vezes vem com planos para conseguir fazer amizades.  Agora ela está entrando no ensino médio e sua única amiga, Yawara Kai, está frequentando uma escola diferente.  Kai lhe dá um ultimato: ela deixará de ser amiga de Bocchi isso até que Bocchi faça amizade com todos os seus colegas de classe.  Bocchi vai conseguir!?


[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 3, Cap 34, porém pulou o cap 33.]

altTitles.ja: 東京のギャルじゃけぇ！

title.en: Blue Archive - The Adventure of Game Development Department!

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。コメディの名手・水あさとが手掛ける、笑えて泣けて可愛い青春コメディ！
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!
